channel.title: Everything Microsoft 365 related
channel.description: Recent content on Everything Microsoft 365 related

item.title: About Us
item.description: About the Microsoft 365 NL UserGroup The Microsoft 365 NL Usergroup is the Dutch user group for everything related to Microsoft 365. The Modern Workplace is hotter than ever, with Microsoft leading the way. What makes Microsoft 365 hard to grasp, is the fact that is built upon several different components. Azure Active Directory, the Office 366 suite of apps, including things like Exchange Online, Teams and the PowerPlatform, Intune, Windows Virtual Desktop… There are a lot of different techniques that make up a real modern workplace.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
